title: Sky Mobile offers Apple MacBook Air M4 for £22 a month in cost-splitting plan
text:
Apple has just unveiled its new MacBook Air and if you're thinking of buying one you might want to check out this deal from Sky Mobile There's a fresh MacBook Air on the block, and it might be time to think about an upgrade. This latest offering from Apple is a standout, boasting a potent M4 processor housed within its sleek aluminium frame.
It also comes with an increased standard RAM (16GB, up from 8GB on entry-level models), an enhanced camera featuring innovative Centre Stage technology, and is available in an eye-catching new Sky Blue shade.
It also includes all the usual perks, such as a crystal-clear display, extended battery life, a comfortable keyboard and the industry-leading Force Touch trackpad.

author: AFP
title: RTL Today - Tuchel's 'aura' can inspire England: Rogers
text:
Aston Villa forward Morgan Rogers says Thomas Tuchel's special "aura" can inspire England's bid to win the World Cup.
Tuchel met up with his players for the first time on Monday ahead of their opening World Cup qualifiers against Albania and Latvia at Wembley.
The German, who began work as Gareth Southgate's successor in January, held a team meeting on Monday night where he outlined his mission for World Cup glory next year.
Rogers, currently managed by Unai Emery at Villa, said he has never worked with a boss with such a magnetic presence.
"When I met him his aura and demeanour, it's hard to describe but he has that level of confidence, that level of respect already," said Rogers, whose country kick off the qualifying campaign against Albania on Friday.
"The presence is a bit different. Certain managers have different ways about them. Certainly his aura is one I've not experienced before. That's different to what I've faced before.
"You can see the way he is, the way he acts. He has been so chilled and calm. But when it is time to work, it is time to work."
England lost the last two European Championship finals under Southgate as their wait for a first trophy since the 1966 World Cup goes on.
As England's third non-British coach, Tuchel is under extra pressure to deliver.
But Rogers is confident the former Chelsea and Bayern Munich boss, who won the Champions League in his time at Stamford Bridge, can cope with the expectations.
"Winning the World Cup is the only goal, he was very clear and transparent with what he wants to do, how he wants to do it, how he wants to go about it, what he sees in us, and what we need to improve," he said.
"It was very straight-up, no cutting round corners. It was straight and that's how he is. The best way to get information across is to be like that."

author: ipanies
title: #26 El teniente coronel israelí David Levi pide la aniquilación y la limpieza étnica de los palestinos en Gaza: "Sólo les queda una opción: morir."
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#4](c4#c-4) Pero en plan Nüremberg donde el tio de la horca usa una cuerda demasiado corta y una trampilla demasiado pequeña accidentalmente
[#11](c11#c-11) Tienen el apoyo incondicional de "occidente"... como para no saberse impunes...
Siempre que veo cosas así cambio el "palestinos" por "judíos" (aunque hubo muchísimas más víctimas rusas que judías... pero bueno) y nunca hay diferencia.
Bueno sí, dudo que en esa época haya habido regiones políticas enteras apoyando eso.
[#18](c18#c-18) Occidente solo es lo que decidan cuatro viejos fascistas en USA y eso lo pagaremos caro los millones de personas que poblamos ese occidente.
Yo, particularmente, me desmarco de esta política que estamos practicando.
Uno tiende a pensar que los genocidios cometidos, por ejemplo, por los nazis el siglo pasado son cosas de la historia que ya no pasan. Vemos una película de los campos de genocidio y pensamos; que malos e hijos de puta era esa gente ¿cómo se puede llegar a esto?
Pero no niños; el ser humano a seguido cometiendo cíclicamente muchos más genocidios desde la segunda guerra mundial y seguirán cometiéndolos. Dan para menos películas y documentales, pero ahí están.
Ahora son los israelitas los que andan con esos fregados; y son el mismo tipo de seres humanos hijos de puta de siempre. Y la sociedad se vuelve a dividir como siempre para criticarlo con los de moral mas laxa mirando para otro lado.
[#14](c14#c-14) Si estás insinuando que pueden de alguna manera darle la vuelta a la situación, me temo que sin ayuda exterior eso no va a pasar.
Buen material grafico el que esta "cosa" y muchos ministros y dirigentes sionistas están dejando en las redes. Espero se esté recopilando para usarse en los juicios que tengan que venir y también como recordatorio para futuras generaciones de lo que esta sucediendo. Pero no olvidemos que nosotros, todo occidente estamos siendo cómplices. Nosotros con nuestros silencios como ciudadanos también.

author: Noel Navarro
title: FIRST ALERT: Snowy hazards in parts of the Western and Eastern UP; chilly northwest winds
text:
By Noel Navarro ,
1 hours ago NWS alerts in effect HERE. The new year begins on a cold, snowy trend in Upper Michigan, as strengthening high pressure from the Prairie Provinces of Canada brings frigid polar air to the region. Moderate to heavy snowfall, poor driving visibility from blowing snow are all possible hazards for the northwest wind belts this week, mainly along and north of M-28 in the Western and Eastern U.P. until the lake effect snow machine gradually dwindles this weekend. Read full article

title: 价值100ETF（512040）跌0.84%，半日成交额4439.62万元|100ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，价值100ETF（512040）跌0.84%，报0.945元，成交额4439.62万元。价值100ETF（512040）重仓股方面， 成都银行 截止午盘跌0.64%， 宸展光电 涨0.54%， 云铝股份 跌2.49%， 郑煤机 跌1.73%， 纽威股份 跌2.06%， 杭叉集团 跌0.96%， 粤高速A 涨0.22%， 招商银行 跌0.70%， 苏美达 跌1.07%， 鲍斯股份 跌1.81%。
价值100ETF（512040）业绩比较基准为中证国信价值指数收益率，管理人为富国基金管理有限公司，基金经理为曹璐迪，成立（2018-11-07）以来回报为113.87%，近一个月回报为0.97%。

author: AdnKronos
title: Natale, per sci e snowboard alto tasso infortuni, 'allenare muscoli e cuore'.
text:
Natale, per sci e snowboard alto tasso infortuni, 'allenare muscoli e cuore'.
| [AdnKronos](/archivio/news/giornalista/16145) |
Roma, 19 dic. (Adnkronos Salute) - Tutti pronti per sciare a Natale. Ma "lo sci e lo snowboard ricreativo presentano alti tassi di infortuni, con un'incidenza compresa tra 2,4 e 7 infortuni per 1.000 giornate di attività. Quindi, sebbene nessuno studio analizzato abbia formalmente investigato programmi di esercizio specifici, la letteratura generale sul fitness e la prevenzione degli infortuni suggerisce: esercizi di forza muscolare, 'core stability', esercizi di flessibilità e mobilità, 'push-up' ed esercizi per la presa per prevenire lesioni ai polsi durante le cadute, esercizi di propriocezione e controllo neuromuscolare". A fare il punto per l'Adnkronos Salute è Andrea Bernetti, segretario generale della Simfer, la Società italiana di medicina fisica e riabilitativa. Per l'esperto, "livelli adeguati di forza, resistenza e controllo neuromuscolare sono essenziali per affrontare le richieste tecniche di questi sport".
"Inoltre è molto importante arrivare fisicamente pronti anche dal punto di vista del fitness cardio circolatorio, soprattutto considerando che lo sforzo di questi sport avviene in altitudine. E' quindi molto importante fare attività fisica che incrementi la resistenza cardiovascolare (ad esempio la corsa o il ciclismo)", prosegue Bernetti.
L'allenamento fisico, l'equipaggiamento e le misure di sicurezza sono fondamentali per ridurre frequenza e gravità degli infortuni. "Una recente revisione della letteratura in merito agli infortuni relativi a sci e snowboard ha mostrato come - elenca il medico-fisiatra - l'uso del casco sia fortemente raccomandato per ridurre i traumi cranici senza aumentare il rischio di infortuni cervicali; altri dispositivi di protezione importanti includono tutori per polsi, ginocchia e colonna vertebrale, specialmente per principianti; è ovviamente importante adattare e regolare correttamente gli attacchi degli sci per prevenire torsioni del ginocchio e altre lesioni; le lezioni formali con gli istruttori migliorano abilità e consapevolezza dei rischi, riducendo comportamenti pericolosi; è di cruciale importanza di rispettare le regole delle piste e scegliere tracciati adeguati al proprio livello tecnico".
